content: witches are my favourite part of halloween combine this with my general obsession with gnomes and the result is this cute wrinkly witch hat that sits in the palm of your hand work the hat as written with medium weight yarn to outfit a gnome or other stuffed animal or ornament or increase / decrease the size by changing your yarn weight or hook size gauge isn t important for this pattern but i ve made some recommendations below to create either a ~6 inch or ~8 inch tall hat thank you for trying my pattern
